hero.name: Alatise Okiki Temidayo
hero.heading: Hay! I’m Techbrain
hero.description: Okiki Temidayo is my name, and I have expertise as a Full-stack Developer in a diverse range of programming stacks and languages. My passion lies in crafting top-notch problem-solving software and web applications that effectively address complex issues and offer substantial value to end-users. My primary ambition and focus have always revolved around creating exceptional projects that positively impact humanity.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR freelancing PROJECTS
about.description: I embody qualities such as outgoingness, dedication, and an open-minded mindset. Effectively connecting with individuals and adapting to dynamic environments comes naturally to me. I firmly believe in the perpetual enhancement of one's professional skill set and the continuous pursuit of knowledge. I possess extensive expertise in diverse domains, including coding, software development, computer hardware, database management, and networking. Moreover, I hold a prestigious certification as a computer engineer with a Cisco accreditation.

details.title: Website Application for startup/Existing School Management
details.description: This comprehensive school application is designed to proficiently manage all aspects of school activities, including those pertaining to teachers, students, Heads of Departments (HODs), and parents. I have developed modules for a range of functionalities such as exams, attendance tracking, classwork management, library services, parent communication, notice boards, course registration, and result management, ensuring seamless scalability of the system. Furthermore, I have successfully installed and configured the payment gateway, guaranteeing smooth performance and minimizing operational complexities.
details.langages: Yii2, HTML, CSS, JS, Api integration

details.title: Banking System Application
details.description: This application has been developed exclusively for a private company. It exhibits comprehensive functionality, enabling the execution of various banking operations such as deposits, transfers, card management, and transaction history recording. The system has been divided into two distinctive segments: the user-facing interface and the banking infrastructure. The frontend has been constructed utilizing React, while the backend has been implemented using Next.js, seamlessly integrating Axios for efficient API handling, and MongoDB to facilitate robust database management.

details.title: Website design for Job provider
details.description: Jobbox is constructed using the Laravel framework, employing PHP, and boasting an aesthetically pleasing frontend design utilizing Bootstrap 4. The core purpose of this project is to alleviate the challenges and complexities associated with job hunting. The system is meticulously categorized into three distinct facets: the individual aspect, the company aspect, and the administration module. We empower both individuals and companies to create job listings, while simultaneously providing agents and users with the opportunity to bid on these job postings. The administrator holds paramount control over all system operations, as their approval is required for each user action.
details.langages: PHP, HTML, CSS, JS, laravel, MySQL

details.title: Web/Mobile Application Design for Store, Supermarket and Mall
details.description: ZipPOS serves as a comprehensive point-of-sale solution tailored for various marketplaces. We meticulously analyze the hierarchical structure inherent to each product-selling marketplace, ensuring that the software program aligns with this specific pattern, encompassing the roles of admin, stocker, and cashier. The admin assumes control over price tag management, while the stocker is responsible for efficient inventory management within the company. Furthermore, this software facilitates meticulous record-keeping for the admin, allowing them to accurately track the inflow and outflow of goods, including any associated debits or losses.

details.title: Front-End Design for Admin Panel
details.description: This administration dashboard has been developed utilizing React.js. Drawing inspiration from Prime, I have incorporated Redux and Tailwind CSS into the project. It encompasses a comprehensive range of components required for creating diverse React applications, ranging from layout components to main views. Each component has been meticulously crafted with attention to detail, presenting a clean and intuitive interface to enhance ease of comprehension.

details.title: Web App for Farmer and People interested in Farming
details.description: The Plant Recognition system is an innovative mobile application designed to accurately identify plants. By simply capturing an image of a plant, users can receive instant information on its common name and botanical name. This application has been developed using React Native for seamless integration with mobile devices, and it utilizes a Kaggle dataset to ensure reliable and comprehensive plant identification.

details.title: Tiktok Clone App
details.description: The TikTok clone app faithfully reproduces the functionality of the original website, while being built on the Flutter framework using the Dart programming language. It encompasses all the key components of the main program, including user registration, chat with comments and likes, and even supports live streaming capabilities. Furthermore, the app incorporates a sophisticated algorithm that strategically promotes each post on a global scale, leveraging location-based targeting to maximize visibility.

details.title: Web/Mobile Application For Ride Provider agent
details.description: Flash is a transportation media mobile app that offers advanced features such as distance calculation between drivers, customers, and customer destinations. Leveraging real-time location services, the app accurately determines the user's precise location. To ensure data authenticity, drivers are required to daily verify their information by capturing images of their vehicles using the provided camera prompt. Additionally, they must capture a self-portrait for visual identification purposes. The main program is developed using Yii2, while React Native is utilized for the mobile app, which is seamlessly connected to MongoDB. Furthermore, the app facilitates communication between drivers and clients, enabling them to engage in chat conversations to negotiate prices.

allService.title: FrontEnd Design
allService.subTitle: My specialization lies in offering comprehensive frontend design services that prioritize the creation of user interfaces that are both intuitive and engaging for websites and web applications. By seamlessly blending aesthetic appeal and usability, I strive to deliver an exceptional digital experience that captivates and satisfies the needs of your users.

allService.title: BackEnd Design
allService.subTitle: Leveraging my expertise in backend design, I am committed to developing resilient and scalable systems that serve as the backbone of your applications. With a deep understanding of server-side programming and API development, I proficiently tackle the intricacies involved, resulting in the creation of highly efficient and secure backend solutions.

allService.title: Mobile Design
allService.subTitle: My specialization lies in the creation of visually captivating and user-friendly mobile app designs that effortlessly engage your target audience and offer seamless experiences across a wide range of devices. Entrust me with the task of transforming your app idea into a stunning reality.

allService.title: Hosting
allService.subTitle: Simplify the deployment of your website or application by utilizing our dependable hosting services. Our hosting environment is designed to be secure and high-performing, guaranteeing that your site remains accessible and responsive to meet the needs of your users.

allService.title: Database Development
allService.subTitle: I possess the ability to design and optimize your database architecture, thereby ensuring efficient data storage, retrieval, and management. Furthermore, I offer dependable database administration services to uphold data integrity and enhance performance.

allService.title: UI/UX Design
allService.subTitle: I possess expertise in the creation of compelling user interfaces and seamless user experiences. My UI/UX design services revolve around a thorough understanding of your target audience, enabling the development of intuitive designs that significantly amplify user satisfaction and stimulate engagement.

allService.title: Scripts Writer
allService.subTitle: Are you in need of customized scripts to automate tasks or enhance functionality? With my extensive experience in script writing, I am capable of developing tailored scripts that streamline workflows, enhance productivity, and automate repetitive processes with exceptional speed.

allService.title: Desktop Application
allService.subTitle: I specialize in developing robust and user-friendly desktop applications that are customized to cater to your specific business needs. My extensive expertise encompasses a wide range of technologies, ensuring flawless performance and intuitive interfaces for your desktop software.

allExperience.companyDescription:
Analyzed systems flow, data usage, and work processes, investigated 100% of problem areas. 
Analyzed 30+ user requirements to derive technical software design and performance requirements. 
Planned, tracked, and managed deliverables on 200+ short-term sprints and 50+ long-term deployments. 
Developed code following common security practices and development design patterns resulting in a 30% reduction in security vulnerabilities and enhancing overall system robustness. 
Supervised a team of 2 IT analysts and managed relationships with external vendors and advisers.Provided one-on-one research consultations to students, leading to improved research outcomes and a 17% increase in productivity.

Developed and enhanced product security systems meeting 100% of client requirements. 
Collaborated with staff to resolve network issues and implement fixes, resulting in 31% fewer malfunctions. 
Analyzed diagnostic data to understand causes/correlations of network issues and presented results to internal staff.
Developed solutions for software/hardware compatibility. 
Installed and upgraded internal applications and documentation, reducing installation errors by 12% Updated workflows for software deployment, tech support, and phone system maintenance, increasing efficiency by 38%. 
Supervised a team of 2 IT analysts and managed relationships with external vendors and advisers.

Led the cleaning and repair of computer systems, to ensure resident safety and comfort, resulting in a 20% decrease in equipment malfunctions and enhanced operational efficiency. 
Led networking and IP telephony infrastructure initiatives, achieving a 40% improvement in network performance and ensuring uninterrupted communication for all users. 
Developed and authored technical documentation for processes and infrastructure, resulting in a substantial reduction of onboarding time for new engineers by 2 days. 
Drove operational improvements, leading to an 11% year-over-year increase in network efficiency and productivity. 
Tested software for bugs and operating speed, achieving resolution of identified issues and documentation of streamlined processes, resulting in an 18% increase in efficiency.

’s Discuss Your Project
sectionHeading.subTitle: I am readily available for freelance work, and I welcome you to contact me if you have a suitable project.
